metadata.title: Azure AI Fundamentals AI-900 Practice Questions

questions.question: Which of the following is a key concept within AI Workloads and Considerations (Domain 1)?
questions.explanation: Anomaly Detection is a key concept in AI Workloads and Considerations. This domain covers topics essential for the Azure AI Fundamentals exam.

questions.question: A professional is tasked with identify guiding principles for responsible ai. What should be the first step?
options: Assess the current state and identify requirements
Document the findings in a report
questions.explanation: The first step in any ai workloads and considerations task is to assess the current state before implementing changes.

questions.question: Which concept in AI Workloads and Considerations is most closely related to identify features of common ai workloads?
options: AI Workloads and Considerations governance and oversight
AI Workloads and Considerations implementation and operations
AI Workloads and Considerations assessment and testing
AI Workloads and Considerations risk management
questions.explanation: Identify features of common AI workloads falls under the implementation and operations aspect of AI Workloads and Considerations.
